title: Online Teacher Training: Web-Based Project Design for Supporting English Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing English learner support strategies applicable to real classrooms in a collaborative learning environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Participants can design three or more web-based projects tailored to English learners' language development stages.
Participants can evaluate five or more online tasks for solving problems in English education settings through Q methodology-based activity analysis.
Participants can improve online training modules by applying the Technological·Pedagogical·Content Knowledge (TPACK) framework.

resources: English Language Learner Support Resource Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
